dialog.npc.banker.name: Caroline
Sorry, I don't loan money to farmers.
One bad season and they come to you crying about their interest rates.
I believe in talking behind peoples' backs. That way, they hear it more than once.
I once knew a person that constantly tried to defraud the Sunlit Valley Hospital...
Terrible person all around, never lent them a dollar.
dialog.npc.banker.intro.0.line_0: Hey stranger, my name is Danny. I'm here to help you build the village you're starting in Sunlit Valley.
dialog.npc.banker.intro.0.line_1: If you're looking to invite more villagers, come talk to me and I can help you build homes for them.
dialog.npc.banker.intro.0.line_2: If you'd prefer to do the building yourself, just let me know and I can give you the invitations and sell any building supplies you'll need.
dialog.npc.banker.intro.0.line_3: That's all I have for now, you really have your work cut out for you here. Come see me if you need anything!
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.0.line_0: I didn't know you were capable of having taste.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.1.line_0: Where did you manage to find something like this?
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.2.line_0: Maybe it's not so bad around here.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.3.line_0: My horse would love something like this.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.4.line_0: Who told you I like this? You're a snake.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.7.line_0: Flattery will get you everywhere with me!
dialog.npc.banker.gift_loved.8.line_0: Is this from your farm? I hope you're selling more of these.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_liked.0.line_0: I already have a few of these, I suppose it saves me a trip to the store.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_liked.1.line_0: This barely changes how I think of you.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_liked.2.line_0: I know someone who would appreciate this.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_liked.3.line_0: Finally someone with some manners around here.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_liked.5.line_0: Hmmm I can use this I think
dialog.npc.banker.gift_liked.7.line_0: It's about time you did something nice for me.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_neutral.0.line_0: Why are you giving this to me...
dialog.npc.banker.gift_neutral.2.line_0: Do you think I'm poor or something?
dialog.npc.banker.gift_neutral.4.line_0: Are you even trying to get me to like you?
dialog.npc.banker.gift_neutral.7.line_0: You waste my time with these trinkets.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_disliked.1.line_0: Of course someone like you would get me this
dialog.npc.banker.gift_disliked.8.line_0: Tasteless, but I don't know what I was expecting from you.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_disliked.11.line_: You waste my time with these awful paperweights.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.0.line_0: Get out of my face with that.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.1.line_0: Why did I even come to this backwater town.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.2.line_0: Keep this up and you won't have a bank around soon.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.4.line_0: I didn't know you think as little of me as I do you.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.8.line_0: Apologize to your parents for becoming a person that does things like this.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.14.line_0: If this is how you run this place I'm wasting my time here.
dialog.npc.banker.gift_hated.15.line_0: Leave me out of your pathetic jokes.
dialog.npc.carpenter.name: Danny
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.0.line_0: Hey stranger, my name is Danny. I'm here to help you build the village you're starting in Sunlit Valley.
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.0.line_1: If you're looking to invite more villagers, come talk to me and I can help you build homes for them.
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.0.line_2: If you'd prefer to do the building yourself, just let me know and I can give you the invitations and sell any building supplies you'll need.
dialog.npc.carpenter.intro.0.line_3: That's all I have for now, you really have your work cut out for you here. Come see me if you need anything!
dialog.npc.carpenter.gift_liked.0.line_0: I love a little treat like this
dialog.npc.carpenter.gift_disliked.1.lin: Why did you think I would like this?
dialog.npc.market.name: Leon
Sorry, I don't loan money to farmers.
One bad season and they come to you crying about their interest rates.
I believe in talking behind peoples' backs. That way, they hear it more than once.
I once knew a person that constantly tried to defraud the Sunlit Valley Hospital...
Terrible person all around, never lent them a dollar.
dialog.npc.market.intro.0.line_0: I can help you with raising your animals on your farm! If you need any supplies just let me know.
dialog.npc.market.gift_loved.0.line_0: I didn't know you were capable of having taste.
dialog.npc.market.gift_liked.0.line_0: Thank you, I really appreciate it.
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.0.line_0: Oh! I wasn't expecting something like this.
dialog.npc.market.gift_disliked.1.line_0: You must know animals way better than people...
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.1.line_0: I don't know why I expected better from you
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.3.line_0: You can just ask me to leave directly.
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.4.line_0: Get out of my face with that
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.5.line_0: Are you trying to upset me on purpose
dialog.npc.market.gift_hated.6.line_0: I knew you didn't have taste.
dialog.npc.shepherd.name: Maria
Sorry, I don't loan money to farmers.
One bad season and they come to you crying about their interest rates.
I believe in talking behind peoples' backs. That way, they hear it more than once.
I once knew a person that constantly tried to defraud the Sunlit Valley Hospital...
Terrible person all around, never lent them a dollar.
dialog.npc.shepherd.intro.0.line_0: I can help you with raising your animals on your farm! If you need any supplies just let me know.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_loved.0.line_0: This makes me feel very at home.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_loved.1.line_0: You're so sweet to me, this is one of my favorites!
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_loved.2.line_0: This is one of my favorites!
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_loved.4.line_0: This makes me feel very welcome here.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_loved.5.line_0: How'd you know I love these?
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_liked.0.line_0: Thank you, I really appreciate it.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_liked.1.line_0: I know the perfect spot for this!
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_liked.2.line_0: I was looking for this at the market the other day! How'd you know?
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_liked.4.line_0: Is this from your farm? This is lovely.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_liked.5.line_0: This is a very considerate gift.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_liked.8.line_0: It's so nice to have people like you here.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_neutral.2.line_: I think one of my friends would like this!
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_neutral.4.line_: Is this from your farm? I've never seen one quite like this.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_disliked.0.line: Oh! I wasn't expecting something like this.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_disliked.1.line: You must know animals way better than people...
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_disliked.2.line: Sometimes it's better to not give gifts.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_disliked.6.line: Did you mean to give this to someone else?
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_disliked.7.line: We don't really have to give gifts to eachother...
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.3.line_0: You can just ask me to leave directly.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.5.line_0: This doesn't make me feel good...
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.6.line_0: I'm not sure I want this...
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.7.line_0: Can you leave me alone please.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.8.line_0: I don't like these kinds of jokes.
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.9.line_0: Sorry but I really don't want this...
dialog.npc.shepherd.gift_hated.10.line_0: This might be the worst thing I've ever been given...
dialog.npc.witch.name: Eliza
dialog.npc.witch.intro.0.line_0: Hey stranger, my name is Danny. I'm here to help you build the village you're starting in Sunlit Valley.
dialog.npc.witch.intro.0.line_1: If you're looking to invite more villagers, come talk to me and I can help you build homes for them.
dialog.npc.witch.intro.0.line_2: If you'd prefer to do the building yourself, just let me know and I can give you the invitations and sell any building supplies you'll need.
dialog.npc.witch.intro.0.line_3: That's all I have for now, you really have your work cut out for you here. Come see me if you need anything!
dialog.npc.witch.gift_liked.0.line_0: I love a little treat like this
dialog.npc.witch.gift_disliked.1.line_0: Why did you think I would like this?
